Игра младше меня на 8 лет, и только в 2022 году я решил пройти этот шедевр от Valve. Даже в наше время игра оставляет положительные эмоции от прохождения, а что было тогда в 98 году когда она вышла в свет ? Думаю она просто срывала умы своей проработанностью мира, сюжета, и геймплея. Итог : Мне очень понравилось играть в игру выпущенную в далеком 98 году.
有些时候会崩掉欸

This is definitely one of the best games period. 

My only problem with it is that the hard difficulty (the only difficulty I played on) is similar to halo 2 on legendary . Where the enemies do stupid amount of damage (especially you helicopter and zap guy). But that's understandable due to the age and what game engines and what not the had accessible at the time.

The story, gameplay, level design (mostly lol), is just so amazing and I wish games were still made with such care and love.
this game, is so amazing, and so cheap! only being 10 bucks and frequently on sale. Basically any computer since 2000 can run it. So get it!!!!

Half-Life é um jogo que não deixa a desejar em nenhum aspecto, o jogo tem uma gameplay ótima mesmo para quem não joga muitos jogos, os gráficos são datados mas garanto que você não vai se incomodar com isso, tenho uma dica caso você nunca tenha jogado ou vai jogar novamente, VOCÊ NÃO É O DOOM GUY, você é um cientista, pense como tal e sua gameplay será muito melhor,

Сама игра очень хорошая, больше всего мне понравилось то, что здесь надо сражаться с американской армией, но само собой и монстры здесь представлены. Единственное, что разочаровывает, так это отсутствие русской локализации. Для установки русского языка требуется изучить более семи вариантов разных озвучек и натурально провести танцы с бубнами, чтобы все файлы установить и чтобы игра при этом работала.
All I can say is Valve knows how to make games

There is no recommendation needed. This game is an epic adventure. Bad ass graphic design for its time. Anyone who ever had a pc back then knows about it and those who didn't used to go to pc halls and play their. One of BEST Games EVER!!!!

Siempre he escuchado de que Half Life es una joya dentro del mundo de los videojuegos, y la verdad no entiendo el por qué, pero tampoco voy a discutirlo.

Es demasiado bueno, me divertí bastante al jugarlo a pesar de que ya tiene sus años, tiene algunos bugs y quizás el sistema de punto de control no sea el mejor, pero es entretenido de jugar, y siendo sincero me ha asustado un poco. No le tenía fe al juego pero la verdad me retracto, recomendado 100%.

I'm not much of a gamer, but I tried Half life: Alyx, and well.. now here I am. Back at the day, I was too young to appreciate Half-life when it was out (and besides, I didn't have a PC), so now I did some homework and read why this game is a LEGEND. But it's hard to embrace this thought retrospectively, so here is my impression as of year 2022: despite dated graphics and simple NPC AI, Half-life is still challenging and absorbing and probably could beat modern games in certain relations. I must highlight the elaborated plot with many details. It's obvious that the overall idea is great, but there were less possibilities to unleash it's full potential 20+ ago. Of course I'm going to walk through the whole series, but I already wish for the sequel.
